keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

map <C-j> scrollDown count=3
map <C-k> scrollUp count=3
# For Linux with Xremap
map <delete> scrollUp count=3

map J scrollPageDown
map K scrollPageUp

map <C-o> goBack
map <C-i> goForward

# I used to these key bindings but am trying to stop it because it is hard to use them on non-macOS.
# map <C-f> scrollPageDown
# map <C-b> scrollPageUp
